mapper.select: select DISTINCT order_sid from t_order where order_sid = #{courseID}
select DISTINCT order_uid from t_order where order_uid = #{userID}

select o.order_id as order_id,o.order_integral as order_integral, c.course_name as course_name,o.charge_time as charge_time,o.order_state as order_state from t_order o,t_course c where o.order_sid = c.course_id and o.order_uid = #{userID} and o.order_state = 1
select order_sid from t_order where order_cid = #{ordercid}
select count(*) from t_order where order_sid = #{courseId} and order_cid = #{sectionId} and order_uid = #{userId}

select DISTINCT o.order_id as order_id,u.user_name as user_name,c.course_name as course_name, o.order_integral as order_integral,o.charge_time charge_time,o.order_cid as order_cid from t_user u,t_order o,t_course c,t_section s where 1 = 1 and u.user_id = o.order_uid and o.order_sid = c.course_id
and u.user_name like '%${userName}%'
and o.order_id like '%${orderID}%'
select c.course_name,c.course_img,o.order_sid,o.order_cid from t_order o,t_course c where o.order_sid = c.course_id and o.order_uid = #{userID}
